articles.description: Birmingham City slipped one place closer to the relegation zone with a 0-0 draw at bottom club Wycombe Wanderers, this is what Aitor Karanka made of it
articles.content:
Aitor Karanka insists he will continue trying his best to turn round Birmingham Citys fortunes.
Blues were held to a 0-0 draw at lowly Wycombe Wanderers on Tuesday evening and have now won just one … [+3324 chars]
